name: Sesame Ginger Beef Kebabs

ingredients.name: red or white onion
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled and cut into even wedges

ingredients.name: low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce
bamboo skewers
ingredients.additionalInstruction: pre-soaked in water to prevent scorching

preparation: Combine steak, onion, and mushrooms with Sesame Ginger Dressing in a medium-size mixing bowl. Allow to marinate for at least 15 minutes, and up to 2 days.
Alternately thread steak, onion wedges, and mushrooms onto bamboo skewers.
Preheat barbecue to medium heat. Grill kebabs turning often for 6–8 minutes, or until cooked as you like.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
